title: When God Says No
verse_text: Three times I pleaded with the Lord…. But he said to me, ‘My grace is sufficient for you.’
insight: God’s no is never rejection - it’s redirection.
one_minute_win: Thank God for one “no” that protected you.
declaration: Every no makes room for a better yes.
